content: 8% Muthoot Finance NCD 2022: Should You Invest In Them?  Goodreturns
description: NCDs or non convertible debentures are nothing but bonds using which the corporates issue to raise fund. These are called non-convertible as for them there is no scope for conversion into equity or stocks. These are advantageous to fixed income investors as they offer a higher return, less risky and also offer tax benefits.
